passive.name: VTOL Jets
passive.leverage_when: Short repositions, vertical peeks, dodging grenades
passive.misuse_warning: Hovering in open air / Extended combat flights

tactical.name: Missile Swarm
tactical.intent: Area denial and displacement / Info gathering
tactical.misuse_warning: Wasting mid-chaos for damage instead of suppression

ultimate.name: Skyward Dive
ultimate.misuse_warning: Late panic usage / Using to push instead of escape
